[Student]: A hilarious new series from the author of HARRY LOVES INTO SLIMUS
[Teacher]: comes just in time for Valentine's Day. Join Harry as he navigates love, friendship, and what it means to be a good friend. Harry's friends, including his best friend Midge, have their own pets, and as Harry tries to find the perfect date for Valentine's Day, he learns that true love comes in all shapes and sizes. Featuring 32 full-color illustrations, this adorable book is perfect for kids of all ages who love animals and love being loved back. I don't
[Student]: recommend this book to anyone who likes funny books maybe even more than ever

text:

[Teacher]: ! 2019 Update When I was little, my favorite hobby was watching anime. I didn't know what anime was at the time, but I saw some shows on TV and loved the colorful pictures and exciting storylines. One of my parents told me that anime was a type of Japanese animation, and I was fascinated. I started watching more anime shows and reading manga (Japanese comics) to learn more about the culture and characters. I even joined some online forums to discuss my favorite shows with
[Student]: other kids who were excited about making anime in Japan

I found a guitar online and started watching YouTube tutorials to learn how to play chords and strum. I practiced every day for a few months until I was playing simple songs. When I joined a local band, it became even more enjoyable, as I got to play with friends and perform in front of people. It

STARTER: Do you celebrate any holidays with your family? Are there any special traditions or funny stories from past celebrations?
text:
[Starter]: Do you celebrate any holidays with your family? Are there any special traditions or funny stories from past celebrations?
[Student]: Lets find out for more festive fun in this festively original and unique Christmas storybook
[Teacher]: ! **Christmas Family Traditions**  Do you have any favorite holiday traditions with your family? Do you enjoy making special treats, decorating the tree, or singing festive carols? Tell us about your family's holiday traditions and the special memories you make together!  **Special Holiday Memories**  What's your favorite holiday memory? Is it making snowmen, building a gingerbread house, or enjoying a special holiday meal together? Share your favorite holiday memory with us and let's get this festive party started!  **
